thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 6 of 396
thread.title: ROBERT BOWERS

author: ROBERT BOWERS
title: ROBERT BOWERS
text: I ordered cassettes for my 67 el camino tape layer. I have ordered other music from other suppliers and received studio cuts or imitation groups singing. Oldies .com give EXACTLY what they advertise! Music by the original artists--just the way we heard them on the radio. Cassettes arrived in factory condition and the music quality was fabulous! I will absolutely order from them again! The only con I have is--one tape did not arrive(I was not charged for it)and I couldn't tell from the invoice if it is back ordered or simply not available. Other than that everything was perfect!!!
